content: **general info ** do you remember the first sunrise you ever saw whether by yourself or with somebody special i believe it was spectacular something special and memorable the pattern first sunrise reminds me of that moment let your creation remind you of that special moment as well the pattern will look gorgeous if you use one solid color ombre or long gradient yarn but you can use any colorway you like this pattern can create any size square blanket but you could also join squares together creating a stunning king size bed cover **now this pattern is available as free ravelry download enjoy the retriremet ** **the pattern includes ** o detailed descriptions o video tutorials for each round o detailed pictures of more complicated parts o pictures after each round posted on crochet patterns by bebablanket group only and final result **skill level ** intermediate **terminology ** us **yarn used for the sample ** ice yarns cakes baby fine / blue shades yarn weight #2 fine/sport fiber content 100 % premium acrylic hook size 4 mm g sample size 50 rounds = 30 7 78 cm square amount of yarn used for sample 3 33 skeins = 1311 yds 1199 m 333 g/11 75 oz 1 https //www timeanddate com/worldclock/converter html iso=20190913t180000&p1=26&p2=179&p3=224&p4=240&p5=250&p6=951&p7=48&p8=259&p9=64 2 https //beba-blanket weebly com/patterns/first-sunrise 3 https //www facebook com/groups/bebablanketpatterns 4 https //www facebook com/groups/668646249929007/ 5 https //calcrochetalong com/
